blinkbox.title: Blinkboxbooks
blinkbox.summary: Tesco's new flagship eCommerce site built with AngularJS
blinkbox.details:
I worked with a world class in-house team for several months to help build this JavaScript full-stack eBooks website which is intended to be a serious rival to Amazon's UK dominance of the sector.

My primary responsibility in this project was to provide solutions to the performance problem. At the initial usability tests in November 2013, the website was over 3mb in size and took 22 seconds to load on the Tesco Hudle Android tablet. By January 2014 the size of the homepage had been reduced to 565kb in size and with a load time of under seven seconds on the low-spec Android tablet the Hudle, and load time of just a few seconds on the desktop.

The website is responsive with a heavy emphasis on visual and functionality polarity between the website and the android and iOS apps.

thomsonreuters.title: Thomson Reuters Japan
thomsonreuters.summary: A vital website for Thomson Reuters in their expanding Far East market.
thomsonreuters.details: Built on the Wordpress platform, I worked with both the Japanese Thomson Reuters team and the team based in Canary Wharf to create a key website for the corporation in their expanding Japanese market. It is a customised Wordpress build with all coding – HTML, CSS, JavaScript and PHP – written by myself.

lawstudent.title:
Thomson Reuters
Law Student
lawstudent.summary: A clean, easy-to-navigate site for Thomson Reuters that is intended to engage university law students.
lawstudent.details: Using Wordpress, this was a website refresh for the law student deparment at Thomson Reuters. Technologies I choose to use included the jQuery

kaplan.title: Kaplan International
kaplan.summary: Owned by the Washington Post Group, Kaplan International is the worlds leading education provider for those seeking to speak English
kaplan.details:
Due to staff sickness, this flagship human resources website had been put to the side for several months. During my time at Kaplan International, I was given the responsibility of working with the human resources team in order to get this project back on track.

My first task was to refactor all the code and although it is built on Wordpress, it is heavily customised to meet the needs of the department responsible for updating and maintaining the site

drnewmans.title: Dr Drewmans Clinic
drnewmans.summary: One of Harley Street's leading specialist private clinics.
drnewmans.details:
Working for the Barn Agency, I built with website on the Drupal 7 platform.
